OEM Partnership Advantages

30-50% Cost Savings

Factory-direct pricing eliminates distributor margins. Competitive unit costs for volume production without compromising quality.

Rapid Response

48-hour quoting and 48-hour prototyping. Quick turnaround for urgent projects and tight product launch schedules.

Quality Guaranteed

ISO 9001 certified processes with 100% electrical testing. Consistent quality from prototype through volume production.

Production Capacity

8,000m² facility with 150+ skilled workers. 5M+ pieces monthly capacity to support your growth.

Global Compliance

UL, RoHS, REACH certified materials and processes. Products compliant with international safety and environmental standards.

Full Customization

Complete design flexibility from connector selection to assembly configuration. Engineering support throughout product development.

Production Capabilities

PROTOTYPE

1-100 Units

Quick-turn manual assembly for design validation and testing.

  • • 48-72 hour turnaround
  • • Design assistance
  • • Flexible iterations

PILOT RUN

100-10K Units

Semi-automated production for pre-production builds and initial market entry.

  • • 1-2 week lead time
  • • Cost optimization
  • • Quality validation

VOLUME PRODUCTION

10K+ Units

Fully automated production with best pricing and consistent quality.

  • • 2-4 week lead time
  • • Lowest unit cost
  • • Production scheduling
